pkgmetadata.longdescription: Construct Nomogram for Competing Risk Models // Nomogram is constructed to predict cumulative incidence rate, which is calculated by adjusting for competing causes other than that of interest. K-fold cross-validation function is implemented to validate the performance. Competing risk version of concordance index is calculated. Methods are as described in: Kattan MW, Heller G, Brennan MF (2003) doi:10.1002/sim.1574.
